price: (82) Exalted is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
